audio_get_master_gain: With this function you can get the absolute value for the global volume of all sounds and music for a specific listener. The default listener index is 0, but you can use the function audio_get_listener_info() to get the different indices available for the target platform. The gain value returned is based on a linear scale from 0 (silent) to 1 (full volume). Note that on some platforms you can have a gain of greater than 1, although a value of 1 is considered "full volume" and anything greater may introduce audio clipping.
